Package sweng.penelope.controllers

Class FileDownloadController

java.lang.Object
sweng.penelope.controllers.FileDownloadController
@Controller public class FileDownloadController extends Object
FileDownloadController handles all download endpoints.

    • serveAsset

      @GetMapping(path="/{type}/{campusId}/{fileName}") @Cacheable(value="assets", key="#fileName") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> serveAsset(@PathVariable String type, @PathVariable String campusId, @PathVariable String fileName)
      Returns the desired asset.
      Parameters:
      type - The asset type (image, video, audio).
      campusId - The ID of the campus the resource belongs to.
      fileName - The asset file name.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity
